snippet: The first network to project the president’s re-election, NBC, was also the most-watched  network on Tuesday night.
abstract: Broadcasts of November 6 election results drew more than 66 million viewers, coming close to matching election night ratings record set in 2008, with 71.5 viewers.
lead_paragraph: The first network to project the president’s re-election, NBC, was also the most-watched  network on Tuesday night.

headline.seo: TV Ratings for Election Night Approach 2008 Record
headline.main: TV Ratings for Election Night Approached 2008 Record
headline.print_headline: TV Ratings for Election Night Approached 2008 Record
